titles.title: A resolution designating March 1, 2013, as "Read Across America Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/27/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates March 1, 2013, as Read Across America Day. Honors Theodor Geisel (Dr. Seuss) for his success in encouraging children to discover the joy of reading. Honors the 16th anniversary of Read Across America Day. Encourages parents to read with their children for at least 30 minutes on Read Across America Day.
